		company profile
		•    •
	
	
		
		  Founded in 2001, Hunan Guochuang Electric Power Co., Ltd. is located in Hengyang, the City of Power Transmission and Transformation in Southern China. inheriting the cultural blood of TBEA, the world leading enterprise in the power transmission and transformation industry, and it persists on the profound technical heritage of TBEA continuously, Guochuang Electric Power has been developed into an excellent enterprise in the field of R&D and manufacturing of transformer unit components at domestic and abroad.  Relying on the profound manufacturing industry background and adopting the integrated development strategy, the Group has energetically developed the Guochuang Electric Power Gathering High-end Intelligent Manufacturing industrial Park and the Beijing-Tianjin-Hebei 5G Science and Technology Industrial Park, deeply integrated the advantages of Internet+ Al, 5G communic···MORE>>
	

	
		core advantages
		•    •
	
	
		Manufacturing capabilities
		Guochuang has the ability to independently design and manufacture. Transformer tanks, iron cores, valves and other products can be customized to meet customer needs. The production cycle of the product is short and the product quality is good.
		
		
		Product research
		  In the research and development of transformer tanks, iron cores, valves and other products, Guochuang is committed to technology-led research and development, with customer satisfaction as the foundation, and has won the trust of many customers with high-quality products.
		
	  
		Advanced equipment
		  Guochuang currently has multiple hydraulic, CNC, and laser production equipment. With its advanced production equipment, strong technical strength and sophisticated testing instruments, Guochuang produces transformer tanks, iron cores, valves and other products that are deeply favored by users.
		
	  
		Quality control
		  Quality is the foundation of any manufacturer. Guochuang has always attached great importance to product quality and detail control. Strictly control the procurement and delivery of raw materials. At present, a mature quality control system for transformer tanks, iron cores and valves has been established.
		
  

	
		honor and qualification

company profile

• •

Founded in 2001, Hunan Guochuang Electric Power Co., Ltd. is located in Hengyang, the City of Power Transmission and Transformation in Southern China. inheriting the cultural blood of TBEA, the world leading enterprise in the power transmission and transformation industry, and it persists on the profound technical heritage of TBEA continuously, Guochuang Electric Power has been developed into an excellent enterprise in the field of R&D and manufacturing of transformer unit components at domestic and abroad.  Relying on the profound manufacturing industry background and adopting the integrated development strategy, the Group has energetically developed the Guochuang Electric Power Gathering High-end Intelligent Manufacturing industrial Park and the Beijing-Tianjin-Hebei 5G Science and Technology Industrial Park, deeply integrated the advantages of Internet+ Al, 5G communic···

MORE>>

core advantages

• •

  • Manufacturing capabilities

    Guochuang has the ability to independently design and manufacture. Transformer tanks, iron cores, valves and other products can be customized to meet customer needs. The production cycle of the product is short and the product quality is good.

  • Product research

    In the research and development of transformer tanks, iron cores, valves and other products, Guochuang is committed to technology-led research and development, with customer satisfaction as the foundation, and has won the trust of many customers with high-quality products.

  • Advanced equipment

    Guochuang currently has multiple hydraulic, CNC, and laser production equipment. With its advanced production equipment, strong technical strength and sophisticated testing instruments, Guochuang produces transformer tanks, iron cores, valves and other products that are deeply favored by users.

  • Quality control

    Quality is the foundation of any manufacturer. Guochuang has always attached great importance to product quality and detail control. Strictly control the procurement and delivery of raw materials. At present, a mature quality control system for transformer tanks, iron cores and valves has been established.

		core advantages
		•核心优势•
	
	
		制造实力Manufacturing capabilities
		国创电力拥有自行设计制造的能力，可以配合客户需求定制变压器油箱、铁芯、阀门等产品，生产周期短，产品质量好。
		
		
		产品研发Product research
		  国创电力在变压器油箱、铁芯、阀门等产品研发方面，致力坚持以科技为研发方面的先导，以客户满意为根本，高质量的产品为国创赢许多客户的信任。
		
	  
		先进设备Advanced equipment
		  国创电力目前拥有多套液压、数控和激光等生产设备，生产设备先进、技术实力雄厚、检测仪器精密让国创生产的变压器油箱、铁芯、阀门等产品受到用户青睐。
		
	  
		品质管控Quality control
		  质量作为任何一个厂家的的立足之本，国创始终非常重视产品的质量和细节把控，从采购原材料到发货都严格把关，目前已经建立了成熟的变压器油箱、铁芯、阀门等质量管控体系。
		
  

	
		company profile
		•公司简介•
	
	
		
		　　湖南省国创电力有限公司厂区占地面积达66395平方米，建筑面积近19260平方米。公司投资上亿元引进了各类先进生产设备，其中包括从欧洲进口的喷砂机器人、机器人焊接流水线、阀门机器人自动化加工线、法兰异形件加工生产线、机器人装配流水线等等。公司不断扩大生产经营规模，“以高端市场和高端产品”为市场开拓目标，打造技术领先、质量可靠的变压器高端外壳装备、高端组件、片散为核心的智能制造高端装备生产研发基地，实现组配件产品的自动化、数字化、信息化和集成化发展。致力于国内国际市场开发，“做强、做精、做优、做先”制造业，从自动化、数字化迈向智能化，走出一条科技含量高、品质过硬、效率高、人力资源优势得到充分发挥的新型工业化道路。顺应国家经济发展战略，推进产业转型升级，实现由输变电领域上下游产业链纵横延伸，加快打造种类最全、技术含量最高、生产效率最快、规模最大的变压器配套产品研发中心。　　公司主要产品有变压器铁芯、油箱、阀门、内外油金属波纹储油柜、密封件、套管、铜件、控制柜、端子箱、中性点成套装置、散热器等变压器所用的所有智能组配件。产品广泛应用于三峡电站、青藏铁路、兰州至官亭750kV、晋东南100···查看详细
	

	
		honor and qualification
		•荣誉资质•
	
	
		二级承装（修、试）电力设施许可证PCCC产品认证国家电网一纸证明3834焊接体系认证质量管理体系认证证书环境管理体系认证职业健康安全管理体系认证中国知名品牌湖南省著名商标中国名优产品二级承装（修、试）电力设施许可证PCCC产品认证国家电网一纸证明3834焊接体系认证质量管理体系认证证书环境管理体系认证职业健康安全管理体系认证中国知名品牌湖南省著名商标中国名优产品二级承装（修、试）电力设施许可证PCCC产品认证国家电网一纸证明3834焊接体系认证质量管理体系认证证书环境管理体系认证职业健康安全管理体系认证中国知名品牌湖南省著名商标中国名优产品

    国创电力目前拥有多套液压、数控和激光等生产设备，生产设备先进、技术实力雄厚、检测仪器精密让国创生产的变压器油箱、铁芯、阀门等产品受到用户青睐。

  • 品质管控

    Quality control

    质量作为任何一个厂家的的立足之本，国创始终非常重视产品的质量和细节把控，从采购原材料到发货都严格把关，目前已经建立了成熟的变压器油箱、铁芯、阀门等质量管控体系。

    • company profile

    • 公司简介 •

    湖南省国创电力有限公司厂区占地面积达66395平方米，建筑面积近19260平方米。公司投资上亿元引进了各类先进生产设备，其中包括从欧洲进口的喷砂机器人、机器人焊接流水线、阀门机器人自动化加工线、法兰异形件加工生产线、机器人装配流水线等等。公司不断扩大生产经营规模，“以高端市场和高端产品”为市场开拓目标，打造技术领先、质量可靠的变压器高端外壳装备、高端组件、片散为核心的智能制造高端装备生产研发基地，实现组配件产品的自动化、数字化、信息化和集成化发展。致力于国内国际市场开发，“做强、做精、做优、做先”制造业，从自动化、数字化迈向智能化，走出一条科技含量高、品质过硬、效率高、人力资源优势得到充分发挥的新型工业化道路。顺应国家经济发展战略，推进产业转型升级，实现由输变电领域上下游产业链纵横延伸，加快打造种类最全、技术含量最高、生产效率最快、规模最大的变压器配套产品研发中心。　　公司主要产品有变压器铁芯、油箱、阀门、内外油金属波纹储油柜、密封件、套管、铜件、控制柜、端子箱、中性点成套装置、散热器等变压器所用的所有智能组配件。产品广泛应用于三峡电站、青藏铁路、兰州至官亭750kV、晋东南100···

	INTRODUCTIONQUALIFICATIONPATENTVIDEO
	




	  Founded in 2001, Hunan Guochuang Electric Power Co., Ltd. is located in Hengyang, the City of Power Transmission and Transformation in Southern China. inheriting the cultural blood of TBEA, the world leading enterprise in the power transmission and transformation industry, and it persists on the profound technical heritage of TBEA continuously, Guochuang Electric Power has been developed into an excellent enterprise in the field of R&D and manufacturing of transformer unit components at domestic and abroad.  Relying on the profound manufacturing industry background and adopting the integrated development strategy, the Group has energetically developed the Guochuang Electric Power Gathering High-end Intelligent Manufacturing industrial Park and the Beijing-Tianjin-Hebei 5G Science and Technology Industrial Park, deeply integrated the advantages of Internet+ Al, 5G communication technology, and has built an intelligent factory integrating automatic data collection and accurate analysis, and enabling digital, automatic and intelligent chemical plants for research, development and manufacturing of power transmission and transformation equipment.  The Group covers an area of 300,000m?, with a building area of nearly 50,000m2. its industrial layout covers Hengyang, Tianjin, Guyang in Inner Mongolia, Shenyang, Changji, and Xi'an, etc. Focusing on the three major fields of new energy, UHV and distribution network, Guochuang Electric Power has deeply cultivated core product lines, such as iron cores, oil tanks, corrugated oil tanks/finwall tank, valve, oil conservators, radiators, new energy towers, high-low voltage switchgears, and intelligent components, etc, it has component products, such as rubber seals, copper parts, bushings, control cabinets, terminal boxes, and neutral point complete sets, which has been developed into an intelligent manufacturing R&D base of transformer unit component industry in China with a large scale and high degree of automation and complete product chains.The Group closely follows the national strategy and actively participates in major energy strategic projects, which products are widely used in many national key demonstration projects, such as the Three Gorges Power Station, Qinghai-Tibet Railway, Lanzhou-Guanting750kv, Southeast Shanxi 1,000kv, and Wudongde ±800kV UHV power transmission and transformation projects. it is a stable supplier of more than 100 large state-owned enterprises and joint ventures, such as CRRC, Shandong Electric, TBEA, Hitachi ABB, Siemens, and Nantong XiaoxingHyosung, etc. The Group adopts a global development strategy, which products are exported to the United States, South Korea, Japan, Vietnam, Indonesia, Thailand, Myanmar, India, Egypt, Colombia and other international markets, winning extensive praise  abroad.The Group insists on independent innovation in science and technology, and has 106 patents, including 28 invention patents, 55 utility models, and 23 appearance designs; It has been recognized as a "National High-tech Enterprise", a "Small Giant" enterprise specialized in special and new technologies ", a "Demonstration Enterprise of Intelligent Manufacturing in Hunan Province", an "Engineering Technology Research Center", and has won many awards, such as the "Mayor's Quality Award", "Science and Technology Innovation Team Award", contributing outstanding strength to promoting the localization process of high-end power transmission and transformation industry equipment.  The Company will equip China and power the world with "green technology, intelligent environmental protection, reliable and efficient" products and services continuously based on the high position of world vision.
	




	
		
ADD:No.1 Baisha Rd, Baishazhou, Yanfeng District, Hengyang City, Hunan Province, China
Customer Services Line:+86-734-2898246
Fax:+86-734-2898247
Contact:Andy/Zhang(Director of International Sales)

    Founded in 2001, Hunan Guochuang Electric Power Co., Ltd. is located in Hengyang, the City of Power Transmission and Transformation in Southern China. inheriting the cultural blood of TBEA, the world leading enterprise in the power transmission and transformation industry, and it persists on the profound technical heritage of TBEA continuously, Guochuang Electric Power has been developed into an excellent enterprise in the field of R&D and manufacturing of transformer unit components at domestic and abroad.

    Relying on the profound manufacturing industry background and adopting the integrated development strategy, the Group has energetically developed the Guochuang Electric Power Gathering High-end Intelligent Manufacturing industrial Park and the Beijing-Tianjin-Hebei 5G Science and Technology Industrial Park, deeply integrated the advantages of Internet+ Al, 5G communication technology, and has built an intelligent factory integrating automatic data collection and accurate analysis, and enabling digital, automatic and intelligent chemical plants for research, development and manufacturing of power transmission and transformation equipment.

    The Group covers an area of 300,000m?, with a building area of nearly 50,000m2. its industrial layout covers Hengyang, Tianjin, Guyang in Inner Mongolia, Shenyang, Changji, and Xi'an, etc. Focusing on the three major fields of new energy, UHV and distribution network, Guochuang Electric Power has deeply cultivated core product lines, such as iron cores, oil tanks, corrugated oil tanks/finwall tank, valve, oil conservators, radiators, new energy towers, high-low voltage switchgears, and intelligent components, etc, it has component products, such as rubber seals, copper parts, bushings, control cabinets, terminal boxes, and neutral point complete sets, which has been developed into an intelligent manufacturing R&D base of transformer unit component industry in China with a large scale and high degree of automation and complete product chains.The Group closely follows the national strategy and actively participates in major energy strategic projects, which products are widely used in many national key demonstration projects, such as the Three Gorges Power Station, Qinghai-Tibet Railway, Lanzhou-Guanting750kv, Southeast Shanxi 1,000kv, and Wudongde ±800kV UHV power transmission and transformation projects. it is a stable supplier of more than 100 large state-owned enterprises and joint ventures, such as CRRC, Shandong Electric, TBEA, Hitachi ABB, Siemens, and Nantong XiaoxingHyosung, etc. The Group adopts a global development strategy, which products are exported to the United States, South Korea, Japan, Vietnam, Indonesia, Thailand, Myanmar, India, Egypt, Colombia and other international markets, winning extensive praise

    abroad.The Group insists on independent innovation in science and technology, and has 106 patents, including 28 invention patents, 55 utility models, and 23 appearance designs; It has been recognized as a "National High-tech Enterprise", a "Small Giant" enterprise specialized in special and new technologies ", a "Demonstration Enterprise of Intelligent Manufacturing in Hunan Province", an "Engineering Technology Research Center", and has won many awards, such as the "Mayor's Quality Award", "Science and Technology Innovation Team Award", contributing outstanding strength to promoting the localization process of high-end power transmission and transformation industry equipment.

    The Company will equip China and power the world with "green technology, intelligent environmental protection, reliable and efficient" products and services continuously based on the high position of world vision.

    Relying on the profound manufacturing industry background and adopting the integrated development strategy, the Group has energetically developed the Guochuang Electric Power Gathering High-end Intelligent Manufacturing industrial Park and the Beijing-Tianjin-Hebei 5G Science and Technology Industrial Park, deeply integrated the advantages of Internet+ Al, 5G communication technology, and has built an intelligent factory integrating automatic data collection and accurate analysis, and enabling digital, automatic and intelligent chemical plants for research, development and manufacturing of power transmission and transformation equipment.

    The Group covers an area of 300,000m?, with a building area of nearly 50,000m2. its industrial layout covers Hengyang, Tianjin, Guyang in Inner Mongolia, Shenyang, Changji, and Xi'an, etc. Focusing on the three major fields of new energy, UHV and distribution network, Guochuang Electric Power has deeply cultivated core product lines, such as iron cores, oil tanks, corrugated oil tanks/finwall tank, valve, oil conservators, radiators, new energy towers, high-low voltage switchgears, and intelligent components, etc, it has component products, such as rubber seals, copper parts, bushings, control cabinets, terminal boxes, and neutral point complete sets, which has been developed into an intelligent manufacturing R&D base of transformer unit component industry in China with a large scale and high degree of automation and complete product chains.The Group closely follows the national strategy and actively participates in major energy strategic projects, which products are widely used in many national key demonstration projects, such as the Three Gorges Power Station, Qinghai-Tibet Railway, Lanzhou-Guanting750kv, Southeast Shanxi 1,000kv, and Wudongde ±800kV UHV power transmission and transformation projects. it is a stable supplier of more than 100 large state-owned enterprises and joint ventures, such as CRRC, Shandong Electric, TBEA, Hitachi ABB, Siemens, and Nantong XiaoxingHyosung, etc. The Group adopts a global development strategy, which products are exported to the United States, South Korea, Japan, Vietnam, Indonesia, Thailand, Myanmar, India, Egypt, Colombia and other international markets, winning extensive praise

    abroad.The Group insists on independent innovation in science and technology, and has 106 patents, including 28 invention patents, 55 utility models, and 23 appearance designs; It has been recognized as a "National High-tech Enterprise", a "Small Giant" enterprise specialized in special and new technologies ", a "Demonstration Enterprise of Intelligent Manufacturing in Hunan Province", an "Engineering Technology Research Center", and has won many awards, such as the "Mayor's Quality Award", "Science and Technology Innovation Team Award", contributing outstanding strength to promoting the localization process of high-end power transmission and transformation industry equipment.

    The Company will equip China and power the world with "green technology, intelligent environmental protection, reliable and efficient" products and services continuously based on the high position of world vision.
